TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaSet extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的缓存。

span.span: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 执行此操作将影响你的代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 （包括内联架构） 是本质上是容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不接受不受信任的方案中。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 架构验证错误消息和异常可能会公开的内容模型的架构文件的 URI 路径的敏感信息。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 请注意不公开此信息向不受信任调用方。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. > - "安全注意事项"部分中介绍的其他安全注意事项。Additional security considerations are covered in the "Security Considerations" section. 缓存或库可以在其中存储 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。 is a cache or library where you can store XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 通过将架构缓存在内存中，而不是从文件或 URL 访问架构，从而提高性能。 improves performance by caching schemas in memory instead of accessing them from a file or a URL. 每个架构由命名空间 URI 和架构添加到集时指定了的位置。Each schema is identified by the namespace URI and location that was specified when the schema was added to the set. 您使用要分配属性对象的 XML 读取器应使用的数据验证。You use the property to assign the object an XML reader should use for data validation. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources. 执行此操作将影响你的代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. 外部命名空间或位置中引用包含，导入和重新定义元素的架构进行解析的基 URI 的架构的包含或导入这些方面。External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them. 例如，如果包括或导入架构的基 URI 为空或`null`，外部位置来解析相对于当前目录。For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory. 类用于解析外部架构默认情况下。The class is used to resolve external schemas by default. 若要禁用解析导入、 包括和重新定义架构的元素，设置属性设置为`null`。To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the property to `null`. - 类使用类来分析和匹配 XML 架构中的正则表达式。The class uses the class to parse and match regular expressions in an XML schema. 使用 XML 架构中的正则表达式模式方面的验证可能涉及到更高的 CPU 使用情况，应避免在高可用性方案。Validation of pattern facets with regular expressions in an XML schema may involve increased CPU usage and should be avoided in high availability scenarios. - 由于使用而引发的异常类，如类可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如，属性的返回导致异常的架构文件的 URI 路径。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 不应在不受信任的情况下公开属性。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 应正确处理异常，以便在不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 以下示例使用 中存储的架构验证 XML 文件。The following example validates an XML file using schemas stored in the . XML 文件 `urn:bookstore-schema` 中的命名空间标识 中要用于验证的架构。The namespace in the XML file, `urn:bookstore-schema`, identifies which schema in the to use for validation. 示例输出所示的 XML 文件具有两个架构冲突：Output from the example shows that the XML file has two schema violations: - 第一个\<书籍 > 元素包含\<作者 > 元素，但没有\<标题 > 或\<价格 > 元素。The first \ element contains an \ element but no \ or \<price> element.</span></span> - <span data-ttu-id="72b6e-129">\<作者 > 中最后一个元素\<书籍 > 元素缺少\<名字 > 和\<最后一个名称 > 元素，而是具有无效\<名称 > 元素。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72b6e-129">The \<author> element in the last \<book> element is missing a \<first-name> and \<last-name> element and instead has an invalid \<name> element.</span></span> [!code-cpp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CPP/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/CS/validschemaset.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/VB/validschemaset.vb#1)] ## <a name="input"></a><span data-ttu-id="72b6e-130">输入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72b6e-130">Input</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72b6e-131">示例使用下列两个输入文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72b6e-131">The sample uses the following two input files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72b6e-132">**booksSchemaFail.xml:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72b6e-132">**booksSchemaFail.xml:**</span></span> [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/booksschemafail.xml#2)] <span data-ttu-id="72b6e-133">**books.xsd:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72b6e-133">**books.xsd:**</span></span> [!code-xml[XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_SchemaSet/XML/books.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中已存在对象，则方法不执行任何操作。If the object already exists in the , the method does nothing. 此方法的功能是相同的方法。The functionality of this method is identical to that of the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas) cil managed

summary.span: 将给定的 中的所有 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构添加到 。

span.span: Adds all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the given to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将架构添加到之前，它必须成功进行预处理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 预处理执行以下基本任务。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 架构检查的结构根据 W3C XML 架构的规则的有效性，但不是完全验证的架构。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 对内部和外部架构组件的引用进行解析。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功检索到任何导入或包含架构也会添加到。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加作为单独对象和包括的架构所做的包括一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 如果的属性若要将添加`true`中的所有架构若要添加将添加到。If the property of the to add is `true`, all schemas in the to add are added to the . 如果的属性若要将添加`false`，添加每个架构在添加之前进行预处理。If the property of the to add is `false`, each schema added is preprocessed before being added. 如果在新添加的架构的任何失败进行预处理，不添加任何架构; 相反，引发。If any of the schemas in the newly added fails to be preprocessed, no schemas are added; instead, an is thrown. 因此，下面的两个代码示例并不等效。As a result, the following two code example are not equivalent. ```vb ' First example schemaSet.Add(schemaSet1) ' Second example Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema in schemaSet.Schemas() schemaSet.Add(schema) Next ``` ```csharp // First example schemaSet.Add(schemaSet1); // Second example foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { schemaSet.Add(schema); } ``` 前面的两个代码示例并不等效。The previous two code examples are not equivalent. 在第一个示例中，如果了无效的架构中存在`schemaSet1`并将其属性设置为`false`，没有架构添加到`schemaSet`。In the first example, if an invalid schema exists in `schemaSet1` and its property is set to `false`, no schemas are added to `schemaSet`. 在第二个示例中，大量的架构可以添加到`schemaSet`之前遇到了无效的架构，将引发异常。In the second example, a number of schemas can be added to `schemaSet` before an invalid schema is encountered and an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了添加到架构，然后添加到一个新使用方法。The following code example illustrates adding schemas to an , then adding the to a new using the method. ```vb Dim schemaSet1 As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/retail", "http://www.contoso.com/retail.xsd") schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/music", "http://www.contoso.com/music.xsd") Dim schemaSet2 As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet2.Add(schemaSet1) ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet1 = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/retail", "http://www.contoso.com/retail.xsd"); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet1.Add("http://www.contoso.com/music", "http://www.contoso.com/music.xsd"); XmlSchemaSet schemaSet2 = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet2.Add(schemaSet1); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将架构添加到之前，它必须成功进行预处理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 预处理执行以下基本任务。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 架构检查的结构根据 W3C XML 架构的规则的有效性，但不是完全验证的架构。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 对内部和外部架构组件的引用进行解析。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功检索到任何导入或包含架构也会添加到。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加作为单独对象和包括的架构所做的包括一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 添加到架构具有相同目标命名空间和架构位置 URL 作为架构已包含在内将返回原始架构对象。Adding a schema to the with the same target namespace and schema location URL as a schema already contained within the will return the original schema object. - 当新的架构已成功添加到，则的属性设置为`false`。When a new schema is successfully added to an , the property of the is set to `false`. - 时，在 XML 架构中遇到任何包含或导入元素将解析调用方法。Any include or import elements encountered in an XML schema are resolved when the method is called. 无法解析包含和导入元素导致架构验证警告，如果没有已为指定对象，这些警告将不会报告。Failure to resolve include and import elements results in a schema validation warning and if no has been specified for the object, these warning will not be reported. - 如果具有中已存在的架构相同的目标命名空间的架构添加到，这两个架构将添加。If a schema with the same target namespace as a schema that already exists in the is added to the , both schemas are added. > [!NOTE] > 此行为不同于已过时对象。This behavior differs from the obsolete object. - 方法能够使用目标命名空间定义的架构中，而无需为参数指定的目标命名空间时调用方法。The method of the has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the method is called. 指定`null`中`targetNamespace`的参数方法指示若要使用的架构中定义的目标命名空间，如下面的代码示例中所示。Specifying `null` in the `targetNamespace` parameter of the method instructs the to use the target namespace defined in the schema, as illustrated in the following code example. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add(Nothing, "books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books") schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add(null, "books.xsd"); foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books")) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ``` 在上面的代码示例`null`指定为`targetNamespace`参数方法。In the code example above, `null` is specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter to the method. 因此，`targetNamespace`定义 books.xml 中使用文件。As a result, the `targetNamespace` defined in the books.xml file is used. 在此情况下，调用的结果将是相同的方法如果`http://www.contoso.com/books`必须指定为`targetNamespace`参数。In this case, the result of calling the method would be identical if `http://www.contoso.com/books` had been specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter. - W3C XML 架构允许没有目标命名空间定义的目标命名空间与要包含在架构中的架构。W3C XML Schema allows schemas without a target namespace to be included in schemas with a target namespace defined. 在这种情况下，没有目标命名空间定义的架构是强制转换为包含架构的目标命名空间。In this case, the schema without a target namespace defined is coerced into the target namespace of the including schema. 包含的架构被视为如同它具有定义该目标命名空间。The included schema is treated as if it had that target namespace defined. 同样，没有目标命名空间的架构可以添加到强制转换后到指定的目标命名空间和方法，如下面的示例中所示。Similarly, schemas without a target namespace can be added to the and coerced into the target namespace specified by the method, as illustrated in the following example. ``` ``` 如果上面的架构添加到目标命名空间`http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`（如下面的代码所示），它被视为就像在架构中声明的目标命名空间是`http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`。If the schema above is added to the with the target namespace `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace` (as shown in the code below), it is treated as if the target namespace declared in the schema was `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace", "http://www.contoso.com/targetnamespace.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema in schemaSet.Schemas() Console.WriteLine(schema.TargetNamespace) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace", "http://www.contoso.com/targetnamespace.xsd"); foreach(XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { Console.WriteLine(schema.TargetNamespace); } ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加`http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd`具有目标命名空间的架构`http://www.contoso.com/books`到。The following code example adds the `http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd` schema with a target namespace of `http://www.contoso.com/books` to the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); ``` 示例使用 `books.xsd` 文件作为输入。The example uses the `books.xsd` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将架构添加到之前，它必须成功进行预处理。Before a schema can be added to an , it has to be successfully preprocessed. 预处理执行以下基本任务。Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks. 1. 架构检查的结构根据 W3C XML 架构的规则的有效性，但不是完全验证的架构。The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated. 2. 对内部和外部架构组件的引用进行解析。References to internal and external schema components are resolved. 已成功检索到任何导入或包含架构也会添加到。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加作为单独对象和包括的架构所做的包括一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including . 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 已成功检索的架构导入或加入由中包含的架构也会添加到。Successfully retrieved schemas imported or included by the schemas contained in the are also added to the . - 如果未定位在根元素上引发除非当前项是一个元素。If the is not positioned on the root element, an is thrown unless the current item is an element. 如果当前项`xs:schema`元素中，架构文档读取到; 否则为因为架构不是有效引发。If the current item is an `xs:schema` element, the schema document is read into the ; otherwise, an is thrown because the schema is not valid. - 如果定位通过 XML 节点的序列，添加仅在序列中的第一个节点。If the is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, only the first node in the sequence is added. - 如果从已创建的架构方法调用、 的值属性被忽略，因为内联架构处理不应用于 W3C XML 架构文档。If the schema was created from a method call, the value of the property is ignored, because inline schema processing is not applied for W3C XML Schema documents. - 属性的不用于解析命名空间或架构中的位置引用包含和导入元素。The property of the is not used to resolve references to namespaces or schema locations in include and import elements. 相反，属性的使用。Instead, the property of the is used. - 方法能够使用目标命名空间定义的架构中，而无需为参数指定的目标命名空间时调用方法。The method of the has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the method is called. 指定`null`或到方法指示使用架构中定义的目标命名空间。Specifying `null` or to the method instructs the to use the target namespace defined in the schema. 此行为的示例，请参阅方法。For an example of this behavior, see the method. 此方法的剩余功能是相同的方法。The remaining functionality of this method is identical to that of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加中包含的 books.xsd 架构使用的目标命名空间`http://www.contoso.com/books`到。The following code example adds the books.xsd schema contained in the with a target namespace of `http://www.contoso.com/books` to the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", New XmlTextReader("books.xsd") ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", new XmlTextReader("books.xsd"); ```

span.span: The schema is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定唯一粒子归属 (UPA) 的验证选项。The class specifies Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) validation options for the . 有关启用 UPA 验证检查的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about enabling UPA validation checks, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Compile() cil managed

summary.span: 将添加到 的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构编译成一个逻辑架构。

span.span: Compiles the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas added to the into one logical schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要验证时自动调用此方法和尚未以前编译-例如，当作为输入用于创建对象中属性对象。This method is called automatically when validation is needed and the has not been previously compiled - for example, when an is used as an input to create an object in the property of an object. 如果是已在已编译状态下，此方法不会重新编译架构。If the is already in the compiled state, this method will not recompile the schemas. 如果此方法成功执行，属性设置为`true`。If this method executes successfully, the property is set to `true`. 以前编译的架构不重新编译。Schemas that have been previously compiled by an are not recompiled. 但是，使用已编译的架构方法的将重新编译。However, schemas that were compiled using the method of the will be recompiled. > [!NOTE] > 您需要调用方法，如果已将其添加到后更改架构 （或其的包括/导入之一） 。You need to call the method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the . 方法将检查架构的结构根据 W3C XML 架构的规则的有效性。The method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema. 但是，它不会执行完整的验证检查。However, it will not perform a full validation check. 它还会解析到内部和外部架构组件的引用。It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components. 已成功检索到任何导入或包含架构也会添加到。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加作为单独对象时包括架构所做的包括一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects while included schemas are made part of the including . 如果要重新处理的调用成功，属性设置为 false。If the call to reprocess is successful, the property is set to false. ## Examples ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet.Compile() ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet.Compile(); ```

exception.span: 当验证和编译 中的架构时发生错误。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 间接地添加到的架构检测到的方法; 例如，导入的架构。Schemas that are indirectly added to the are detected by the method; for example, imported schemas. 因此，如果架构`http://www.contoso.com/retail`导入的架构命名空间`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空间添加到，则调用与`http://www.contoso.com/books`作为参数，它将返回`true`。As a result, if a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/retail` namespace which imports a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is added to the , calling with `http://www.contoso.com/books` as a parameter, it returns `true`.

summary.span: 获取 中逻辑 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的数量。

span.span: Gets the number of logical XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .
The number of logical schemas in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有两个架构的命名空间`http://www.contoso.com`中，则属性将返回 1，因为这些架构将被视为单个逻辑架构用于验证的目的。If there are two schemas for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com` in the , the property would return 1 because the schemas are treated as a single logical schema for validation purposes. 但是，如果在命名空间的架构`http://www.contoso.com/retail`导入的架构`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空间的值属性将为 2。However, if a schema for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com/retail` imported a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace, the value of the property would be 2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果架构在 中编辑， 属性不受影响。The property is not affected if schemas are edited while in the . 不跟踪对 中各个架构的更新。Updates of the individual schemas in the are not tracked. 因此，只要 中没有添加或移除任何架构，即使 `true` 中包含的一个架构已更改， 属性也可以为 。As a result, the property can be `true` even though one of the schemas contained in the has been altered, as long as no schemas were added or removed from the . ## Examples 有关的示例属性，请参阅方法。For an example of the property, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Reprocess(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema schema) cil managed
Public Function Reprocess (schema As XmlSchema) As XmlSchema

span.span: The schema to reprocess.

summary.span: 重新处理已经存在于 中的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Reprocesses an XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema that already exists in the .

returns.span: 如果架构有效，则为 对象。

span.span: An object if the schema is a valid schema.

returns.span: 如果架构无效且指定了 ，则将返回 并引发适当的验证事件。

span.span: If the schema is not valid and a is specified, is returned and the appropriate validation event is raised.

returns.span: 否则会引发 。

span.span: Otherwise, an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新处理架构执行对架构执行的所有预处理步骤时调用方法。Reprocessing a schema performs all the preprocessing steps performed on a schema when the method is called. 如果在调用是否成功，请属性设置为`false`。If the call to is successful, the property is set to `false`. 中的架构之后，应使用重新处理方法已被修改，之后执行编译。The Reprocess method should be used after a schema in the has been modified, after the has performed compilation. > [!NOTE] > 您需要调用方法，如果已将其添加到后更改架构 （或其的包括/导入之一） 。You need to call the method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the . 方法将检查架构的结构根据 W3C XML 架构的规则的有效性。The method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema. 但是，它不会执行完整的验证检查。However, it will not perform a full validation check. 它还会解析到内部和外部架构组件的引用。It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components. 已成功检索到任何导入或包含架构也会添加到。Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the . 导入的架构添加作为单独对象时包括架构所做的包括一部分。Imported schemas are added as separate objects while included schemas are made part of the including . 如果要重新处理的调用成功，属性设置为 false。If the call to reprocess is successful, the property is set to false. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重新处理架构添加到。The following example illustrates reprocessing a schema added to the . 后使用编译方法，并添加到架构修改属性将设置为`true`，即使在架构已被修改。After the is compiled using the method, and the schema added to the is modified, the property will be set to `true`, even though a schema in the has been modified. 调用方法执行由执行的所有预处理方法和集属性设置为`false`。Calling the method performs all the preprocessing performed by the method and sets the property to `false`. ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() Dim schema As XmlSchema = schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") schemaSet.Compile() Dim element As XmlSchemaElement = New XmlSchemaElement() schema.Items.Add(element) element.Name = "book" element.SchemaTypeName = New XmlQualifiedName("string", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema") schemaSet.Reprocess(schema) ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); XmlSchema schema = schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); schemaSet.Compile(); XmlSchemaElement element = new XmlSchemaElement(); schema.Items.Add(element); element.Name = "book"; element.SchemaTypeName = new XmlQualifiedName("string", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"); schemaSet.Reprocess(schema); ```

span.span: The schema is not valid.

exception.span: 作为参数传递的 对象为 。

span.span: The object passed as a parameter is .

span.span: The object passed as a parameter does not already exist in the .

span.span: Returns a collection of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ICollection Schemas() cil managed

summary.span: 返回 中所有 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the .

returns.span: 对象，它包含已添加到 中的所有架构。

span.span: An object containing all the schemas that have been added to the .

returns.span: 如果没有架构添加到 ，则返回空的 对象。

span.span: If no schemas have been added to the , an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的间接添加到架构因为它们已导入。This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the because they were imported. > [!NOTE] > 方法等效于方法的已过时。The method is the equivalent of the method of the obsolete . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问中的所有架构。The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas() schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); foreach (XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas()) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ICollection Schemas(string targetNamespace) cil managed
Public Function Schemas (targetNamespace As String) As ICollection

span.span: The schema property.

summary.span: 返回 中属于给定命名空间的所有 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the that belong to the given namespace.

returns.span: 对象，它包含已添加到 的中的属于给定命名空间的所有架构。

span.span: An object containing all the schemas that have been added to the that belong to the given namespace.

returns.span: 如果没有架构添加到 ，则返回空的 对象。

span.span: If no schemas have been added to the , an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`targetNamespace`参数是`null`或，则返回所有没有命名空间的架构。If the `targetNamespace` parameter is `null` or , then all schemas without a namespace are returned. 此方法返回的间接添加到架构因为它们已导入。This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the because they were imported. > [!NOTE] > 方法等效于方法的已过时。The method is the equivalent of the method of the obsolete . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问中的所有架构`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空间中的。The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace in the . ```vb Dim schemaSet As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd") Dim schema As XmlSchema For Each schema In schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books") schema.Write(Console.Out) Next ``` ```csharp XmlSchemaSet schemaSet = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemaSet.Add("http://www.contoso.com/books", "http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd"); foreach (XmlSchema schema in schemaSet.Schemas("http://www.contoso.com/books")) { schema.Write(Console.Out); } ```

summary.span: 指定一个事件处理程序，用于接收有关 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构验证错误的信息。

span.span: Specifies an event handler for receiving information about XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置接收架构验证错误的相关信息的事件处理程序时或方法的调用。Sets an event handler for receiving information about schema validation errors when the or methods of the are called. 如果未定义的事件处理程序，则上的任何验证错误引发位置是。If an event handler is not defined, an is thrown on any validation errors where the is . 验证错误不会引发异常的。Exceptions are not thrown for validation errors with an of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了添加来验证 XML 文档的架构时捕获错误和警告。The following code example illustrates adding a to capture errors and warnings when validating an XML document against a schema. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CPP/xmlschemasetexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/CS/xmlschemasetexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/VB/xmlschemasetexample.vb#1)] 该示例使用 books.xml 文件作为输入。The example uses the books.xml file as an input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xml#2)] 该示例使用 books.xsd 文件作为输入。The example uses the books.xsd file as an input. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaSetOverall Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaSetOverall Example/XML/books.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ XmlResolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

summary.span: 设置用于解析在架构的包含和导入元素中引用的命名空间或位置的 。

span.span: Sets the used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.

value.span: ，用于解析在架构的包含和导入元素中引用的命名空间或位置。

span.span: The used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的用于解析命名空间或位置中引用包含和导入元素的架构，架构将添加使用任何时间或方法。The of an is used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema, any time a schema is added using the or methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 外部命名空间或位置中引用包含，导入和重新定义元素的架构进行解析的基 URI 的架构的包含或导入这些方面。External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them. 例如，如果包括或导入架构的基 URI 为空或`null`，外部位置来解析相对于当前目录。For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory. 类用于解析外部架构默认情况下。The class is used to resolve external schemas by default. 若要禁用解析导入、 包括和重新定义架构的元素，设置属性设置为`null`。To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the property to `null`.
